label: Visual Studio Community 2017 on Windows Server 2016 (x64)
displayName: Visual Studio Community 2017 on Windows Server 2016 (x64)
description:
Visual Studio Community is our free, full featured and extensible IDE for non-enterprise application development. This image contains the recommended product install of the originally released (or 'RTW') version of Visual Studio Community 2017 on Windows Server 2016. It allows you to easily and quickly set up a development environment in Azure to build and test applications using Visual Studio.

This image was created from the latest bits available on 12/19/2017.

The Visual Studio software is preinstalled in this VM, but you must acquire a Visual Studio subscription separately which allows you to sign in to and run Visual Studio on this VM.
